transferFrom.description: Transfers _value tokens from address _from to address _to.

approve.description: Approves _spender to spend _value tokens on behalf of the caller.

mint.description: Mints _amount tokens and assigns them to address _to.

burn.description: Burns _value tokens from the caller's account.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by address _owner.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that _spender is allowed to spend on behalf of _owner.

paused.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

mintingFinished.description: Returns true if minting is finished, false otherwise.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner.

reclaimToken.description: Reclaims tokens sent to this contract.
